👋 Hello,

I am a **data scientist** specializing in statistics, machine learning, and human-subjects experiments

I lead the **experimental and analytical teams** in the cognitive engineering lab at the university of toronto. Previously, I worked as **data science consultant** at armilla ai, as **research intern** at ericsson, and as teaching assistant in **statistics** and **human factors** at the university of toronto

Since july 2024 i hold a phd in industrial engineering from the university of toronto, focused on evaluating the impact of explainability on human performance in automated decision assistance

I built this website to collect personal projects, thoughts and resources

The picture was taken at panixerpasshütte (🏔️ 2407 m), a mountain cabin in glarus süd, switzerland, on august 30th 2024 around 9 pm
